name: Scrap City: Wreck Rally
description:
Scrap City is an up-to-4 player local multiplayer top-down racing game where players can lay traps to hinder or explode their opponents.

Developed by Grandma's Favorite Indie Team for the indie team game studio course at Columbia College Chicago.

Credits:

Programming and design: Cole Bonnema, Justin Carpenter, Parker Hamilton

Art: Amanda Wylie, Issac Young, Thorne Drwal, Dan Steinmetz

Sound: Ami Patel, Cole Krueger, James Post
